name: Our Pigmented Bonds
description:
Play as a shy newcomer that has just moved into Rivertown. Through her monochromatic eyes, help create connections to see how colorful the world truly is.

--------------------------------

Controls: 

  • W/A/S/D: Move
  • [ENTER] : Interact 
  • Arrow Keys: Move Camera
  • [ESC] : Menu

-----------------------------------------------

Team Lucky Stars Members:

  • SaltedSporks: Lead Director, Programmer, Artist and Musician
  • Emuboiii: Musician, Co-Artist, and Co-Character designer
  • Astro: Game designer and Character Concept designer
  • Quarkk: Title Background Artist

Made with : RPG Paper Maker !

Note: There isn't a load game implemented yet, but it will definitely be put in when the game is complete

------------
